category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
YOU ARE THE BLESSED GOD,
happy and complete in Yourself,
the source of happiness for everyone You created,
my maker, my provider, my Lord, and the one who holds me up.

You created me and keep me going,
You've supported me, been generous to me, saved me, and protected me.
In every situation, You are able to handle my needs and my struggles.

May I live by Your strength,
live for Your glory,
and never be satisfied with my spiritual growth
unless I am becoming more like Christ.
And may living by his values, attitude, and actions
grow in my life every hour.

Let Your incredible love be what motivates me to live a holy life,
and turn my duty into my delight.

If other people think my faith is foolish,
my humility is weakness,
my passion is crazy,
my hope is a fantasy,
or my actions are hypocritical,
may I be glad to take the heat for Your name.

Keep me walking steadily toward that place
of endless joy,
that paradise that is my true home.

Hold me up with heavenly strength,
so that I never turn back
or get tempted by fake pleasures
that just fade and disappear into nothing.

As I follow this path toward heaven by Your grace,
let me be known as a person with only one real aim:
a passionate desire for You,
and for the good and salvation of others.
